title: HTML is something else
text: Are you familiar with HTML? Head, Body and Footer are the structure there. Not for LaTeX.

title: A little bit about physics and philosophy
text: Everything in reality strifes for entropy. The digital world however, is not reality.

title: Ruling out an option
text: A strong body is always a good thing. However, LaTeX can do much more than create a body of text.

title: Ruling out another option
text: Just as with the body, LaTeX does not need always have a table of content.
